title: Did Barnes and Noble Market a Parody of Trump’s Presidency as a Children’s Book?
subtitle: Some social media users reacted with outrage to the publication of "If You Give a Pig the White House" in October 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In October 2019, Barnes & Noble sold or marketed a satire of Donald Trump's presidency as a children's book, or placed it in the children's section of stores.
